trans-unit.source: Represents an Access Control Entry (ACE), and is the base class for all other ACE classes.
An ACE contains both an ACE header and a binary blob.
trans-unit.target: Записи управления ДОСТУПОМ содержит заголовок элемента управления ДОСТУПОМ и двоичный.

trans-unit.source: The header contains information about the type of the ACE, various flags, and the size of the binary blob.
trans-unit.target: Заголовок содержит информацию о типе элемента управления ДОСТУПОМ, различные флаги и размер двоичного.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AceFlags" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AceFlags" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object.

An <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceFlags> object contains flags that specify information about the inheritance, inheritance propagation, and auditing conditions for an Access Control Entry (ACE).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.AceFlags> Объект, содержащий флаги, определяющие наследование, распространение наследования и условия для управления доступом (ACE) аудита.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of this Access Control Entry (ACE).
The type of this ACE.
Gets the audit information associated with this Access Control Entry (ACE).
The audit information associated with this Access Control Entry (ACE).
trans-unit.target: Данные аудита, связанные с этой записи управления доступом (ACE).

trans-unit.source: Gets the length, in bytes, of the binary representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object.
This length should be used before marshaling the ACL into a binary array with the <see cref="M:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce.GetBinaryForm(System.Byte[],System.Int32)" /> method.
The length, in bytes, of the binary representation of the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Длина в байтах двоичного представления текущего объекта <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of this Access Control Entry (ACE).
The <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object that this method creates.
The binary data from which to create the new <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object.
The offset at which to begin unmarshaling.
Creates a <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object from the specified binary data.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object this method creates.
The <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object.
Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object.

<see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The byte array into which the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> is marshaled.
The offset at which to start marshaling.
Marshals the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object into the specified byte array beginning at the specified offset.
<paramref name="offset" /> is negative or too high to allow the entire <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAcl" /> to be copied into <paramref name="array" />.
Serves as a hash function for the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> class.
The <see cref="M:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce.GetHashCode" /> method is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures like a hash table.
A hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object.
Gets flags that specify the inheritance properties of this Access Control Entry (ACE).
Flags that specify the inheritance properties of this ACE.
trans-unit.target: Флаги, определяющие свойства наследования данного элемента управления доступом.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that specifies whether this Access Control Entry (ACE) is inherited or is set explicitly.
<see langword="true" /> if this ACE is inherited; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Если этот элемент управления ДОСТУПОМ наследуется; в противном случае <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object to compare.
The second <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> to compare.
Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> objects are considered equal.
<see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> objects are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Эквивалентный метод для этого оператора является <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> object to compare.
The second <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> to compare.
Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> objects are considered unequal.
<see langword="true" /> if the two <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce" /> objects are unequal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Эквивалентный метод для этого оператора является <xref:System.Security.AccessControl.GenericAce.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets flags that specify the inheritance propagation properties of this Access Control Entry (ACE).
Flags that specify the inheritance propagation properties of this ACE.
trans-unit.target: Флаги, определяющие свойства распространения наследования данного элемента управления доступом.
